name: Sakura Sato
description: Sakura Sato is a second-year student majoring in Japanese Literature at the University of Tokyo
Sakura is particularly interested in contemporary literature and enjoys exploring new forms and methods of literary expression
Currently, Sakura is writing a short story themed around Japanese youth culture
Sakura is taking classes in both literary theory and creative writing practice
Sakura lives in an apartment in Tokyo with her parents and younger sister
Sakura's best friend, Hanako Tanaka, is also studying in the same department, and they often study together in the library
Sakura enjoys Hanako Tanaka's sense of humor and intellectual conversations
Sakura is a member of the university's literary club, where she has made many friends
Sakura still occasionally keeps in touch with her childhood friends, Taro Yamada and Ichiro Suzuki
Sakura's dream is to become a famous writer in the future and bring a fresh perspective to Japanese literature

goals.long_term: Become a famous writer and bring a fresh perspective to Japanese literature

mid_term.description: Win the top prize in this semester's Creative Writing workshop
